meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of postmodernism.
meanings.sent1: The art exhibit showcased various postmodern pieces.
meanings.sent2: Her writing style is very postmodern, blending different genres effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The postmodern twist in the movie made everyone laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: His fashion sense was a postmodern mix of vintage and futuristic elements.
meanings.sent5: The building's architecture was a stunning example of postmodern design.

meanings.definition: Denoting a style and concept in the arts characterized by a distrust of theories and ideologies and by the drawing of attention to conventions.
meanings.sent1: The postmodern artist challenged traditional norms with their unique approach.
meanings.sent2: The play's postmodern themes left the audience pondering its deeper meanings.
meanings.sent3: The postmodern twist in the plot caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her music was a postmodern symphony of sounds and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The postmodern film deconstructed storytelling in a refreshing way.
